Text:
I'm still seeding this folks, but only at night from around 11 PM East Coast US time until around 9-10 am as my Optimum OnLine connection is insanely inconsistent and unreliable and the torrents eat too much bandwidth and interferes with my VOIP. Sorry, but don't give up, I'm for sure there for you every night.

Of course if others who've already downloaded this would stick around to seed afterward, then it wouldn't only be on me and one or two others.
